text: West Mains is an area of the Scottish new town East Kilbride, in South Lanarkshire. West Mains is a residential area in the northwest of the town, bordering College Milton and East Mains. East Kilbride railway station falls under the district. There are two primary schools in the area - Kirktonholme and St Kenneth's Primary Schools. These were both rebuilt in 2009/2010 as part of the South Lanarkshire Schools modernisation programme. ==External links== * West Mains Community Council Category:Areas of East Kilbride
title: West Mains, East Kilbride
